title: ‘Tighten the security of all MPs’ – Speaker requests IGP
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Parliament Speaker has advised the Parliament staff to include the NO Confidence Motion against President Gotabaya Rajapaksa into the agenda, as a motion to express displeasure on the President.
Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena said he requested the IGP to tighten the security of all Parliamentarians.
Troops & Military vehicles deployed to ensure public security – Army
Sajith will ONLY accept premiership, if President resigns – Kiriella
